summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 CHEVROLET SUBURBAN. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V383000 (AIR BAGS); HOWEVER, THE REMEDY WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT CALLED A LOCAL DEALER (SUN CHEVROLET, LOCATED ON 2939 WASHINGTON RD, MCMURRAY, PA 15317) WHO STATED THAT PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER ALSO STATED THAT PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE VIN WAS INVALID. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
